hep.aida.ref.tree
Class Folder

java.lang.Object
  hep.aida.ref.event.AIDAObservable
      hep.aida.ref.ManagedObject
          hep.aida.ref.tree.Folder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Connectable, hep.aida.dev.IDevManagedObject, hep.aida.IManagedObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
MountPoint
public class Folder
extends ManagedObject

A Folder is a managed object representing a directory in a tree. It is used only within the Tree implementation, and is never exposed to the user.

Version:
$Id: Folder.java,v 1.8 2005/06/04 00:38:12 turri Exp $

The AIDA team @ SLAC.
